    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120552</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>

            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120552</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Žični ali  ploščati  naboj?</string>
            <string language="en">Line of charge or sheet of charge?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeile der Ladung oder Blatt der Ladung?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ligne de charge ou feuille de charge ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Linha da carga ou folha de carga?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riga della carica o foglio della carica?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γραμμή δαπάνης ή φύλλο της δαπάνης;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Línea de la carga u hoja de la carga?</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Razlika med žičnim in ploščatim nabojem v prerezu.</string>
            <string language="en">Difference between line and sheet charge when viewed  from cut through.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">električno polje</string>
            <string language="en">electric field</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">gaussov zakon</string>
            <string language="en">gauss's law</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterschied zwischen Zeile und Blatt laden auf, wenn er 
durch vom Schnitt angesehen wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La différence entre la ligne et la feuille chargent une 
fois visualisée de la coupe à travers.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A diferença entre a linha e a folha carrega quando vista 
do corte completamente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La differenza fra la riga ed il foglio si carica una volta
osservata dal taglio attraverso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η διαφορά μεταξύ της γραμμής και του φύλλου χρεώνει 
όταν από την αποκοπή εμφανίζεται κατευθείαν.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La diferencia entre la línea y la hoja carga cuando está
vista de corte a través.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrisch fangen Sie auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesetz des Gausss</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">champ électrique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la loi du gauss</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">campo elétrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">lei do gauss</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">campo elettrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">legge del gauss</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλεκτρικό πεδίο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">νόμος Gaoy'</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">campo eléctrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ley del gauss</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
